HediffDef.label: Shadow
HediffDef.description: Shadow damage.

HediffDef.label: Gravity Well
HediffDef.description: Slowed by an unnatural gravitational attraction.

HediffDef.label: Soul Bond
HediffDef.description: Soul bonded to a Succubus.

li.label: bliss (physical)
li.description: My pain is gone. I'm floating in a sea of euphoria.

HediffDef.label: Soul Bond
HediffDef.description: Maintaining a soul bond contract with another pawn.

HediffDef.label: Soul Bond
HediffDef.description: Soul bonded to a Warlock.

li.label: bliss (mental)
li.description: My worries and concerns have been washed away. Things that used to concern me are now little more than distractions that float away in a haze of dreams and reality.

HediffDef.label: Soul Bond
HediffDef.description: Maintaining a contract with another pawn that bonds their soul with mine.

HediffDef.label: Dominate I
HediffDef.description: Mentally dominated by a warlock - reduces mental state and may cause various mental breaks.

HediffDef.label: Dominate II
HediffDef.description: Mentally dominated by a warlock - reduces mental state and may cause various mental breaks.

HediffDef.label: Dominate III
HediffDef.description: Mentally dominated by a warlock - reduces mental state and may cause various mental breaks.

HediffDef.label: Dominate IV
HediffDef.description: Mentally dominated by a warlock - reduces mental state and may cause various mental breaks.

HediffDef.label: Dominate I
HediffDef.description: Under the effects of a succubus dominatrix - stunts all physical actions.

HediffDef.label: Dominate II
HediffDef.description: Under the effects of a succubus dominatrix - stunts all physical actions.

HediffDef.label: Dominate III
HediffDef.description: Under the effects of a succubus dominatrix - stunts all physical actions.

HediffDef.label: Dominate IV
HediffDef.description: Under the effects of a succubus dominatrix - stunts all physical actions.

HediffDef.label: Vitality Drain
HediffDef.description: Physically drained but mentally relaxed through intimacy with a succubus.

li.label: Vitality Drain
li.description: That succubus was amazing - my worries are a dull memory and I feel relaxed, even a little lethargic.

HediffDef.label: Vitality Boost
HediffDef.description: Physical boost acquired by draining the energy from a pawn during intimacy.

HediffDef.label: Demonic Flames
HediffDef.description: Demonic flames that swirl and writhe around the form of a demon.

HediffDef.label: Soul Consumption
HediffDef.description: Flames of destruction that will never cease until they consume the soul of this pawn.

HediffDef.label: Demon's Scorn
HediffDef.description: The partial transformation of a succubus into a demon; grants increased physical powers and absorbs damage.

HediffDef.label: Demon's Scorn
HediffDef.description: The partial transformation of a succubus into a demon; grants increased physical powers and absorbs damage.

HediffDef.label: Demon's Scorn
HediffDef.description: The partial transformation of a succubus into a demon; grants increased physical powers and absorbs damage.

HediffDef.description: The partial transformation of a succubus into a demon; grants increased physical powers and absorbs damage.
